body: Hey guys, so basically ive been practising on badlion a lot recently and id like to 1v1 some members of the community, I don't mind your skill level, I'm expecting to be rekt by a few members, so yeah if you wanna 1v1 me just say what badlion kit (Build UHC, Kohi ETC) and your skype so we can arrange a time

title: 1v1 Me- iSmilez/Bob_Treebark!! :)
